content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

The target structure consists of two separate constructions side by side on a checkered floor:

## Left Construction:
- 3 layers tall
- Bottom layer: 2 orange cylindrical pillars standing vertically
- Middle layer: 1 yellow rectangular block placed horizontally across the two pillars
- Top layer: 1 orange cylindrical pillar on the left side with a yellow half-cylinder/dome on top

## Right Construction:
- 4 layers tall
- Bottom layer: 2 orange cylindrical pillars standing vertically
- Middle layer: 2 yellow rectangular blocks placed horizontally across the two pillars
- Upper layer: A red rectangular block with an arch/tunnel on the left yellow block, and a blue cube on the right yellow block
- Background: 2 stacked orange cylindrical pillars with an orange triangular/pyramid roof on top

## Total Block Count: 12 blocks

# Selected Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, I need the following blocks:
- 6× Block #8 (orange vertical cylinder)
- 3× Block #6 (yellow horizontal rectangular block)
- 1× Block #10 (yellow dome/half-cylinder)
- 1× Block #1 (red rectangular block with tunnel)
- 1× Block #3 (blue cube)
- 1× Block #15 (orange triangular roof/pyramid)

# Assembly Instructions

```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 8
  Step2: Move block with index 8
  Step3: Move block with index 6
  Step4: Move block with index 8
  Step5: Move block with index 10
  Step6: Move block with index 8
  Step7: Move block with index 8
  Step8: Move block with index 6
  Step9: Move block with index 6
  Step10: Move block with index 1
  Step11: Move block with index 3
  Step12: Move block with index 8
  Step13: Move block with index 15
}
```

The assembly proceeds from the ground up, first completing the left structure (steps 1-5), then moving to the right structure base and platforms (steps 6-9), adding the upper blocks (steps 10-11), and finally constructing the tall pillar with roof (steps 12-13).
